body.name: Utopia Bedding Adjustable Bed Risers 3 & 6 Inch - Pack of 8 - Furniture Risers with Anti Slip Foam & Rubber Pad - Stackable Bed Lifts Risers Heavy Duty for Sofa, Bed, Table, Couch & Chair (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 57 mins
FREE pickup Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 57 mins
features: COMPLETE SET: Includes 8 furniture risers (each of 3 inches) with 8 anti-slip foam pads for the top and 8 anti-slip rubber pads for the bottom, ensuring stability and floor protection.

DURABLE & SOLID: Featuring a robust and solid construction, our each furniture riser is designed to effortlessly support an impressive weight capacity of up to 1250 pounds, ensuring long-lasting durability and stability for your cherished furniture pieces.

MULTI-HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT: Elevate your furniture with ease using these bed risers, each capable of increasing the height by a convenient 3 inches. Plus, with their stackable design, you can easily double the elevation to a total of 6 inches, providing versatility and adaptability for your home or office setup.

CREATES EXTRA SPACE: Elevate your bed and furniture creating valuable storage space with these furniture risers. These stackable bed risers not only help you maximize your under-bed storage but also prioritize safety with their anti-slip padding, giving you peace of mind as you enjoy the extra room for your belongings.

VERSATILE LIFTING SOLUTION: These furniture risers offer a versatile solution for elevating furniture such as desks, sofas, beds, and more, providing extra storage space beneath while safeguarding both your valuable furniture and your floor from damage. These bed risers are designed to securely lift furniture legs with dimensions up length, width and diameter up to 3.35 inches (8.5 cm), providing extra height and storage space while ensuring stability and safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought couches but they were too low for us.Bought the 3” ones. @ first was very wary of them as we are seniors but now we’re used to it. Great product & wonderfully made.Super stable & makes it easier to get up.Worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: I tried a few different types of risers for our bed frame before finding these, and so glad we found these ones! I have a frame with more than the usual number of legs, so it was great to be able to buy multiple packs in order to fit my needs. The shape of these risers also works super well for my frame, which has multiple legs that need risers very close together. For that reason, it’s great that these risers are in a very straight shape, compared to the usual shape that widens at the bottom. The foam pads are a nice addition as well, which isn’t typically included with risers, and help make the bed feel just a bit sturdier. Overall I definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great for a queen bed
reviews.reviewText: I used these to level up my bed-by a lot. I needed over 4 inches of space below so I bought two sets and stack them on each other. I am more than pleased for the past weeks slept on it-the bed did not fall off yet.However, one set only came with 6pads instead of 8, hence one star off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very modular compared to some other risers!
reviews.reviewText: I found that these risers, being shorter per unit, allowed for a more modular use. I wanted my king-size bed to be slightly tilted, with the head higher than the feet, for health benefits, but while keeping the mattress completely flat.Seeing as my bedframe has two supports at the feet, two at the middle, and two at the head, I was able to use three units per head support, two per middle support, and one per support at the foot, and this accomplished what I wanted in a very stable and satisfactory way. Very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had My Doubts
reviews.reviewText: I had my doubts, and I was very nervous about purchasing this item. I was afraid the bed might fall over, but it is impressively sturdy and well designed. Definitely worth the money, I am now able to store my luggage under the bed. Saves a lot of closets space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the purpose it was purchased for. Excellent Product
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product to raise the head of our bed. For medical reasons it needed elevated. There are 12 risers which allowed for all three feet at the head of the bed, King size bed. They are very sturdy, have an indention on top to keep the foot of the bed from sliding off. have rubber skid cushions for top and rubber skid cups for the bottom. The material appears very strong, thick and sturdy. Only time will tell how sturdy. I am very satisfied with the product and is what I expected by the description given.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unintentional Hair Magnet
reviews.reviewText: These function seemingly fine for working as a furniture riser except the included rubber mats that are intended to be placed around the bottom edge of the cups are incredibly difficult to attach and seemingly effortless to come off if sliding the furniture for cleaning needs. The base material seems to be sturdy enough to hold up some furniture (though I'm uncertain if I would trust it with something as heavy as a bed). The material in question, though, appears to be a magnet for pet hair, almost like a balloon that has a high static charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm Surprised I Haven't Used These Sooner
reviews.reviewText: --| Overview |--I purchased this for two reasons.1) I came across an older model roomba, it would wedge itself in the curve of the sofa and get compressed in the carpet, and not have enough torque to get out.2) I'm quite tall and figured a taller sofa might be nicer in general. Previous configuration put my knees above the waistline and this made getting up more effort then it should be if it were just at the right height to begin with.This solution seemed the easiest, but perhaps not the best. I figured the best would be actual replacement legs, but these are harder to come by. I decided to roll the dice and try these and so far they seem to work out well and address both these problems.--| Pros |--- 4 sets of 2 Pieces makes it quite tall.- Makes getting up and down from the sofa easier as a tall person.- the Roomba no longer gets stuck under the sofa.--| Cons |--- 8 pieces, with 4 set of foam and rubber means this will be a set of 4; either stacked, or one piece with 4 pieces that would be useless without a lot of effort.- still a small amount of wobble in the double stack configuration on carpet. - I have found that using the foam, but not the rubber bottom works best. - This allows the support lines to bite into the carpet more and give less play--| Conclusion |--I feel these add more height and addresses the Roomba getting stuck and makes it easier to get up and down from the sofa. They are a viable solution.I feel replacement legs might have been a better solution, but the sofa already had 5 inch legs on it. I would have needed to find 8-10 inch legs which are hard to find, but would probably look better and have zero play in them if made right.This option was cheaper and easier and seems to do the trick, so I plan to keep using these.
I use them on my recliner and they work great as long as you get them aligned with your chair feet.

reviews.reviewerName: Platico un poco frágil, con 2 semanas de uso empieza a doblarse
reviews.reviewText: Buen tamaño para levantar y soporta sin problema un sillón grande, lo único al ser anti derrapante es complicado moverlo

They are very sturdy and easily hold the weight of the bed and anyone in it.Clearly not going to topple and it's awesome they include 8, so you can do lot's with that number.If you needed to elevate the head of the bed, you can do it super easy.Would recommend in a second.

reviews.reviewTitle: Große Verbesserung der Lebensqualität für kleines Geld
reviews.reviewText: Meine fast 89jährige, stark gehbehinderte Muttter kommt kaum noch aus dem Sessel hoch. Diese banalen, kleinen Klötzchen waren für sie buchstäblich ein Quantensprung an Lebensqualität.Theoretisch kann man zwei Klötze übereinander stapeln (Die Packung enthält acht identische Klötze). Davon rate ich ab: Das Ergebnis ist nicht stabil. Das mag mit anderen Möbeln funktionieren, die sich nicht bewegen. Bei der Benutzung eines Sessels ergeben sich aber immer leichte Bewegungen nach vorne oder hinten. Also haben wir die Klötze auf zwei Sessel aufgeteilt.Die Teile sehen recht billig aus, deshalb ein Punkt weniger bei den B-Noten. Allerdings waren die Klötze auch recht billig.Über die Haltbarkeit kann man noch nichts sagen.Meine Mutter ist jedenfalls begeistert.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We used these on our sofa which was quite low. I was having great difficulty rising from it because of arthritis in my knees. But the extra 3” has made things so much easier. The sofa legs just fit into the cups, but you need to measure carefully to ensure they will fit. Because of the weight of the sofa it was quite difficult to fit them but it was well worth the effort. Only criticism is having to buy a pack of 8 when we only needed 4, but they are great value for money and do the job perfectly.
